Text: why is it so hard for people to upload a quality rip without using VBR? I mean all you have to do is set your program to rip it at a certain bit rate. For instance all of mine are 320 kbps. I know it takes up a little more room, nut it's worth it when you play it.
i agree, i'm going to put my confessions cd up at 256 kbs VBR, really nice quality. just wait a few days!

You idiots... bitrate is dependent on the file size, its never going to be exactly 320kbps or 256 or whatever. kbps = file size in kilobits/number seconds (per means divide, if anyone remembers math class) Great upload BTW.
